categories.name: Consumable
categories.description: These are items that are expected to be used up or consumed quickly, such reagents, cleaning supplies, and office materials.

categories.name: Durable
categories.description: These are items that are expected to last for a long time, such as machinery, equipment,

categories.name: Reagents
categories.description: A type of consumable stock item, specifically a chemical substance or mixture used in laboratory tests, experiments, or procedures

hazards.name: Chemical Hazards
hazards.description: Substances that can cause harm through chemical reactions, explosions, or toxic emissions.

hazards.name: Biological Hazards
hazards.description: Organisms or substances that can cause harm through infection, allergy, or toxicity.

hazards.name: Physical Hazards
hazards.description: Objects or conditions that can cause harm through impact, cutting, or crushing.

hazards.name: Radiation Hazards
hazards.description: Sources of ionizing or non-ionizing radiation that can cause harm through exposure.

hazards.name: Fire Hazards
hazards.description: Materials or conditions that can cause or contribute to a fire.

hazards.name: Explosion Hazards
hazards.description: Substances or conditions that can cause an explosion.

hazards.name: Electrical Hazards
hazards.description: Equipment or conditions that can cause electrical shock or electrocution.

hazards.name: Ergonomic Hazards
hazards.description: Conditions that can cause strain or injury through repetitive motion or poor posture.

hazards.name: Psychological Hazards
hazards.description: Factors that can cause mental health issues, such as stress or anxiety.

hazards.name: Environmental Hazards
hazards.description: Substances or conditions that can harm the environment or contaminate natural resources.
